wikipedia_page.main: Cyril Parry (born 13 December 1937) is an English former professional footballer who played for Derby County, Notts County and Bourne, as a winger. His four brothers were also footballers - Jack played for Derby County, Ray for Bolton Wanderers and England, and Reg and Glynn who both played in non-league.

response: Cyril Parry is the name of:

link_mentions.page: List of English association football families
response: * Jack Parry, Ray Parry (brother), Cyril Parry (brother)
